readme:
# Telegram User Registration module

Offers an efficient way to manage new and returning users in your Telegram bot workflow. It checks user data against a Google Sheets database, saving essential user information and ensuring personalized interactions.

## Key Features:

  * User Lookup: Searches for users in a Google Sheets database based on their unique Telegram ID.
  * New User Handling: Automatically registers new users, capturing details such as first name, last name, username, and language code.
  * Returning User Recognition: Detects when an existing user returns and updates their status.
  * Data Storage: Safely stores user information in a structured format, with fields for status and date of registration.
  * Personalized Greetings: Delivers customized welcome messages for both new and returning users, promoting engagement.



## Setup Instructions:

  * Copy this Telegram User Registration Workflow
  * Follow the instructions inside:  
![20240922_110313.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_11_03_13_85367f0628.png)
  *     * Use Google Sheet template
  *     * Set up your credentials
  *     * Use example data to test workflow
  * Customization: Adjust the status and messages for users based on your bot's needs.



## Connecting to the bot Workflow:

  * [Copy my Telegram bot starter template](https://n8n.io/workflows/2402-telegram-bot-starter-template-setup/)
  * Copy Workflow ID of your Telegram User Registration Workflow ![20240922_104826.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_10_48_26_ebd1b9ef50.png)
  * Find the **Register** module in Telegram bot starter template and paste your Workflow ID![20240922_104826.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_10_49_20_ab88f8e852.png)
  * Now the user's data is entered into the Register Workflow.



This module provides a scalable foundation for managing user registration, whether your bot is for meal planning, customer support, or other interactive services.

## My easy to set up Telegram bot modules:

  * 🏁 [Telegram bot starter template](https://n8n.io/workflows/2402-telegram-bot-starter-template-setup/)
  * 📝 Telegram callback menu (soon)



Please reach out to [Victor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gubanovvictor/) if you need further assistance with you n8n workflows and automations!
readme_html:
Telegram User Registration module

Offers an efficient way to manage new and returning users in your Telegram bot workflow. It checks user data against a Google Sheets database, saving essential user information and ensuring personalized interactions.

Key Features:

  • User Lookup: Searches for users in a Google Sheets database based on their unique Telegram ID.
  • New User Handling: Automatically registers new users, capturing details such as first name, last name, username, and language code.
  • Returning User Recognition: Detects when an existing user returns and updates their status.
  • Data Storage: Safely stores user information in a structured format, with fields for status and date of registration.
  • Personalized Greetings: Delivers customized welcome messages for both new and returning users, promoting engagement.

Setup Instructions:

  • Copy this Telegram User Registration Workflow
  • Follow the instructions inside:
    • Use Google Sheet template
    • Set up your credentials
    • Use example data to test workflow
  • Customization: Adjust the status and messages for users based on your bot's needs.

Connecting to the bot Workflow:

  • Copy my Telegram bot starter template
  • Copy Workflow ID of your Telegram User Registration Workflow
  • Find the Register module in Telegram bot starter template and paste your Workflow ID
  • Now the user's data is entered into the Register Workflow.

This module provides a scalable foundation for managing user registration, whether your bot is for meal planning, customer support, or other interactive services.

My easy to set up Telegram bot modules:

  • 🏁 Telegram bot starter template
  • 📝 Telegram callback menu (soon)

Please reach out to Victor if you need further assistance with you n8n workflows and automations!
readme_zh:
# Telegram用户注册模块

为您的Telegram机器人工作流提供高效的用户管理方案。该模块通过Google Sheets数据库核验用户数据，保存关键用户信息并确保个性化互动。

## 核心功能：

  * 用户查询：根据Telegram ID在Google Sheets数据库中检索用户
  * 新用户处理：自动注册新用户，记录姓名、用户名、语言代码等信息
  * 老用户识别：检测回归用户并更新状态
  * 数据存储：以结构化格式安全存储用户信息，包含状态和注册日期字段
  * 个性化问候：为新老用户发送定制欢迎消息，提升互动体验

## 安装指南：

  * 复制本Telegram用户注册工作流
  * 按照内置指引操作：  
![20240922_110313.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_11_03_13_85367f0628.png)
  *     * 使用Google Sheet模板
  *     * 设置凭证
  *     * 使用示例数据测试工作流
  * 自定义：根据机器人需求调整用户状态和消息模板

## 连接机器人工作流：

  * [复制我的Telegram机器人启动模板](https://n8n.io/workflows/2402-telegram-bot-starter-template-setup/)
  * 复制您的用户注册工作流ID ![20240922_104826.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_10_48_26_ebd1b9ef50.png)
  * 在启动模板中找到**注册**模块并粘贴工作流ID![20240922_104826.png](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/2024_09_22_10_49_20_ab88f8e852.png)
  * 用户数据将自动录入注册工作流

本模块为膳食计划、客户支持等各类交互服务机器人提供了可扩展的用户注册管理基础。

## 我的简易Telegram机器人模块集：

  * 🏁 [Telegram机器人启动模板](https://n8n.io/workflows/2402-telegram-bot-starter-template-setup/)
  * 📝 Telegram回调菜单（即将上线）

如需n8n工作流和自动化技术支持，请联系[Victor](https://www.linkedin.com/in/gubanovvictor/)！
